mainEntity.name: What does the basic operations calculator do?

acceptedAnswer.text: It adds, subtracts, multiplies, or divides two numbers and shows the result instantly.
No. The calculator warns you when the second value is zero because division by zero is undefined.

structuredData.name: Calculate a percentage increase or decrease
structuredData.description: Use starting and ending values to determine percent change.

step.text: Subtract the starting value from the ending value.
Divide the difference by the starting value.
Multiply by 100 to convert the change into a percentage.
